meanings.definition: Shrewd or keen in judgment or insight.
meanings.sent1: She made an argute decision to invest in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: The detective's argute observations helped solve the case.
meanings.sent3: His argute choice of words left everyone impressed.
meanings.sent4: The argute businessman always knew how to make a profit.
meanings.sent5: Her argute analysis of the situation was spot on.

meanings.definition: Clever or sharp in expression or style.
meanings.sent1: The comedian's argute jokes had the audience laughing all night.
meanings.sent2: Her argute wit was admired by all her friends.
meanings.sent3: The argute twist in the story caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: His argute writing style captivated readers around the world.
meanings.sent5: The artist's argute use of colors brought the painting to life.
